title: 我注册正版了，密保想更改，求详细解答（回答足够好，附赠30）
author: coldflow

replies.txt_content: 在修改密码的地方 周围找找应该可以找到修改密保的

replies.author: coldflow
replies.txt_content:
1277832129 发表于 2014-5-1 07:23
在修改密码的地方 周围找找应该可以找到修改密保的
点哪个？





QQ图片20140501073558.jpg

2014-5-1 07:37 上传

replies.author: 玥丶Angel
replies.txt_content:
https://account.mojang.com/me/settings

点击Security questionsYour account is secure.

replies.author: coldflow
replies.txt_content:
玥丶Angel 发表于 2014-5-1 08:37
https://account.mojang.com/me/settings

点击Security questionsYour account is secure.
Change security questions


Error! An e-mail was already sent within the last two hours, try again in a while. 

Go check your inbox!

replies.author: 玥丶Angel
replies.txt_content:
coldflow 发表于 2014-5-1 08:58
Change security questions
去看邮箱啊，两小时内已经发过一个了

replies.author: coldflow
replies.txt_content:
玥丶Angel 发表于 2014-5-1 09:04
去看邮箱啊，两小时内已经发过一个了
是更改密码的，我要改密保

replies.author: 玥丶Angel
replies.txt_content:
coldflow 发表于 2014-5-1 09:06
是更改密码的，我要改密保
我说的就是改密保
https://account.mojang.com/me/settings/changeSecretQuestions/send

这是申请改密保的邮件发送链接

replies.author: coldflow
replies.txt_content:
玥丶Angel 发表于 2014-5-1 09:15
我说的就是改密保
https://account.mojang.com/me/settings/changeSecretQuestions/send
可是我的邮箱里就有一份改密码的邮件

replies.author: 玥丶Angel
replies.txt_content:
coldflow 发表于 2014-5-1 09:19
可是我的邮箱里就有一份改密码的邮件
所以提示两小时内已发送过一封邮件。

你两小时以后再重新选择发送吧

replies.author: coldflow
replies.txt_content:
玥丶Angel 发表于 2014-5-1 09:27
所以提示两小时内已发送过一封邮件。

你两小时以后再重新选择发送吧
没有短信啊，总是提示Change security questions


Error! An e-mail was already sent within the last two hours, try again in a while. 

Go check your inbox!

replies.author: iWeny
replies.txt_content: change security questions是让你改填完密码后要问的问题，就是什么你爸姓啥之类的问题。有一个邮件已经发到你的邮箱了，可能被认为垃圾邮件被拦截了，可以去垃圾邮件那一栏找一找。我没改过正版的密码，以上是本人对英文及个人经历的理解。望楼主采纳
